add_column_field(attribute, column_type)[source]¶

Automatically add a field for a given column in the SQLAlchemy model, using the column type to determine the Marshmallow field type. The function will ignore any attributes that start with an underscore.

Parameters:

  • attribute (str) – The name of the attribute to add to the schema.

  • column_type – SQLAlchemy column type.

Returns:

None

add_relationship_field(attribute, relationship_property)[source]¶

Automatically adds a field for each relationship in the SQLAlchemy model, using the relationship type to determine the Marshmallow field type. Ignores any relationships that start with an underscore.

Parameters:

  • attribute (str) – The attribute name for the relationship field.

  • relationship_property (obj) – SQLAlchemy relationship property object.

dump(obj, *args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Custom serialization for SQLAlchemy model instances.

generate_fields()[source]¶

Automatically add fields for each column and relationship in the SQLAlchemy model. Also adds fields for hybrid properties. :returns: None

load(data, *args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Custom deserialization for SQLAlchemy model instances.

flask_scheema.scheema.utils.create_dynamic_schema(base_class, model_class)[source]¶

Creates a dynamic schema class that inherits from the base_class and has the model_class as its model.

flask_scheema.scheema.utils.get_input_output_from_model_or_make(model: Callable)[source]¶

Gets the input and output schemas from the model, or creates them if they do not exist.

Parameters:

model (Callable) – The model to get the schemas from.

Returns:

The input and output schemas.

Return type:

tuple

flask_scheema.scheema.utils.get_scheema_subclass(model: callable, dump: bool | None = False)[source]¶

Searches through all subclasses of AutoScheema to find the one that matches the model and dump parameters.

Parameters:

  • model (callable) – The model to search for.

  • dump (bool) – Whether to search for a dump or load schema.

Returns:

The subclass of AutoScheema that matches the model and dump parameters.
